p: For SBV, the SB10-ELP2 ABD-SB10 complex prevented mortality in 5 out of 6 mice whereas the SB9-ELP2 ABD-SB10 complex protected all of the inoculated mice ( Figure 5J). In both groups, none of the surviving animals showed any clinical signs of disease or significant weight loss. In addition, for all the antibody treated mice viral RNA loads in blood and tissue samples were markedly reduced in comparison to the control animals ( Figure 5â€”figure supplement 1).
